solution_line_template: The students' entrance fee cost ${student_fee} x {num_students} = $<<{student_fee}*{num_students}={total_student_fee}>>{total_student_fee}.
The adults' entrance fee cost ${adult_fee} x {num_adults} = $<<{adult_fee}*{num_adults}={total_adult_fee}>>{total_adult_fee}.
Therefore, the school will pay a total of ${total_student_fee} + ${total_adult_fee} = $<<{total_student_fee}+{total_adult_fee}={total_fee}>>{total_fee} for the farm entrance.
